EmailTemplate.subject: Refer your friends to NCS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Refer your friends to NCS
Dear {!IF"(!Contact.Parent_Name__c)"="" "Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.FirstName}" "{!Contact.Parent_Name__c}"
It’s great to hear that {!Contact.FirstName} has a place on NCS this summer. You now have the chance to share your unique referral code with any friends or family who would like to sign their young person up.*
How it works: When someone uses your code to sign up they will pay the discounted price of £35. If that wasn’t enough, you will also automatically receive a £20 Love2Shop voucher (link Love2Shop website) which can be used in a variety of stores and restaurants including John Lewis, Marks and Spencer and Pizza Hut.**
What to do: Send the below code onto anyone that would like to sign up. {!Contact.Promotional_Code__c} We are really looking forward to seeing {!Contact.FirstName} on NCS this summer.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
*Participants must be 16 or 17 on 31 August of the current calendar year. This means 15 year olds can attend summer programmes providing they turn 16 on or before 31 August that year. ** A maximum of 3 vouchers will be given to one person/family
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
